title: Lubuntu 24.04 LTS to Ship with Optional Wayland Session, Improved Installer
description:
The upcoming Lubuntu 24.04 LTS distribution will ship with an optional Wayland session and an updated Calamares installer with new options to improve the installation experience.

The post Lubuntu 24.04 LTS to Ship with Optional Wayland Session, Improved Installer appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
